  Retrieves information about a permission in Poweradmin. You can look up a permission by ID or name. Permissions are read-only and define what actions users can perform.
---

# poweradmin_permission (Data Source)

Retrieves information about a permission in Poweradmin. You can look up a permission by ID or name. Permissions are read-only and define what actions users can perform.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (Number) The permission ID. Either id or name must be specified.
- `name` (String) The permission name (e.g., 'zone_content_view_own'). Either id or name must be specified.

### Read-Only

- `descr` (String) Description of what this permission allows
